text: Tereza Mrdeža was the defending champion, but lost in the second round to Anna Bondár. Maryna Chernyshova won the title, defeating Réka Luca Jani in the final, 6–1, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Zagreb Ladies Open - Singles
title: 2019 Zagreb Ladies Open – Singles
